name: Sniper zombie killer
description:
You are the last man standing! A virus, unlike anything we've seen before, destroyed whole male population. Women were safe, due to female hormones, and were able to live the normal life, but virus mutated. And now each women is in a danger.

Become the savior of mankind! Take on the role of Adam, help women (each one of them could become your Eva) move to the safe place and to revive human race! Kill zombies and save the healthy women!Key features:
  • 132 Different Women
  • 14 different zombies + 132 women zombies (each women will become zombie if any zombie bite her)
  • 10 types of weapons with different characteristics
  • 60 languages localization
Types of women's animated behavior:
  • 16 types of panic
  • 20 types of wound
  • 17 types of death
  • 15 types of walking
Controls:
  • "p" to switch weapon
  • "1"-"0" fast switch to a certain weapon
  • Left mouse - fire
  • Right mouse - zoom
